name: Buff Rhythm
description: You must download the game to play all songs so far. The web version is for song 1. You can download if you want but you don't have to. We are trying our best to work on the game. The Misses is now the score due to a code error. Its fine though. Its way better than you would think. Also if I were you I would download the game. It shows support. You will also have the rights to add images from Buff Rhythm to Games, Videos, NFTS, and everything else. 2 Collabs/Crossovers have been done. We will do more.
